issue.title: Change Monitor servlet name and web.xml
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

As suggested here #399, and if PSC validate this change, we could take benefit of the new MONITOR release to adapt the servlet name to get uniformized EasySDI names.

current name : Monitor
new name : sdi_monitor

New web.xml would be adapted as well.

_Does it impl a lot in term of code change ?_

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Accepted according to  #399

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Does this still make sense ?

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

In my opinion it doesn't make sense anymore!
So I suggest to reject this feature, if you agree with.

Bruno
